name: Happy New Year (nijolas)
description:
Help the New Year's revellers enjoy the fireworks display. 

Choose the correct colour and type of firework using the buttons on the right and then click the sky to launch it. Be sure to give the crowd what they want - they will steadily grow more numerous and less patient.

This is my second published game for "Weekly Game Jam - Week 234". I would like there to be more types of fireworks but I have run out of time. I think this project makes much better use of the Godot engine and feels less "spaghettified".
